caption.p: Effects of cashew nuts on cytokines production CAR-induced. Investigation of cytokines is mandatory when talking of inflammatory condition. As predicted, during CAR-caused inflammation, we observed a significant increase in TNF-α, IL-1β, IL-6 levels; vice versa we observed a significant decrease in IL-10 production. Cashew nuts administration 30 min before CAR-injection at the dose of 100 mg/kg significantly reduced pro-inflammatory cytokines expression and, vice versa, increased anti-inflammatory expression of IL-10. TNF-α ( A), IL-1β ( B), IL-6 ( C), and IL-10 ( D). See materials and methods for further details. # p < 0.05 vs. CAR; ## p < 0.01 vs. CAR; *** p < 0.001 vs. sham.
